greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Sum_{d|n} sigma(d) - 2*Sum_{2c|n} sigma(c) + 4*Sum_{4b|n} sigma(b).
link: J. S. Rutherford, The enumeration and symmetry-significant properties of derivative lattices, Act. Cryst. A48 (1992), 500-508. See g(n).
formula: Dirichlet g.f. (1-2/2^s+4/4^s)*(zeta(s))^2*zeta(s-1). Dirichlet convolution of [1,-2,0,4,0,0,0..] with A007429.
maple: t2:=0; for d in t1 do if d mod 2 = 0 then t2:=t2+sigma(d/2); fi; od:
t3:=0; for d in t1 do if d mod 4 = 0 then t3:=t3+sigma(d/4); fi; od:
mathematica: a[n_] := Sum[DivisorSigma[1, d] - 2 Boole[Mod[d, 2] == 0] DivisorSigma[1, d/2] + 4 Boole[Mod[d, 4] == 0] DivisorSigma[1, d/4], {d, Divisors[n]}];
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Mar 12 2009
